programs.name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
programs.description: The Bachelor of Science in Computer Science program provides students with a comprehensive understanding of computer science theory and practical skills. Students learn programming languages, algorithms, data structures, software engineering principles, and more.

requirements.SAT/ACT: Minimum SAT score of 1200 or ACT score of 25

programs.name: Master of Science in Computer Engineering
programs.description: The Master of Science in Computer Engineering program offers advanced study in hardware and software aspects of computer systems. Students delve into areas such as computer architecture, embedded systems, VLSI design, and parallel computing.

programs.name: Ph.D. in Computer Science
programs.description: The Ph.D. in Computer Science program is designed for students interested in pursuing research in various areas of computer science. Students conduct original research under the guidance of faculty mentors and contribute to advancements in the field.

requirements.Research Experience: Strong research background with published papers

programs.name: Bachelor of Technology in Artificial Intelligence
programs.description: The Bachelor of Technology in Artificial Intelligence program focuses on the theory and application of AI technologies. Students learn about machine learning, natural language processing, robotics, and autonomous systems.

requirements.SAT/ACT: Minimum SAT score of 1200 or ACT score of 25

programs.name: Master of Science in Cybersecurity
programs.description: The Master of Science in Cybersecurity program prepares students to tackle the growing challenges of securing digital systems and networks. Students gain expertise in areas such as cryptography, network security, ethical hacking, and risk management.

programs.name: Dual Degree Program: B.S. in Computer Science and M.S. in Data Science
programs.description: The Dual Degree Program offers students the opportunity to earn both a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and a Master of Science in Data Science in five years of study. This integrated program provides a solid foundation in computer science along with specialized training in data science and analytics.

requirements.SAT/ACT: Minimum SAT score of 1300 or ACT score of 28
